:orphan:

dyndnsc command line interface
==============================

Synopsis
--------

**dyndnsc** [*options*] [*params* ...]


Description
-----------

:program:`dyndnsc` is the command line interface to sync dynamic dns entries.


:program:`dyndnsc --help` will give a list of available options.


See also
--------

:manpage:`dyndnsc(1)`
